summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 24, 2019. It details staff shifts, assignments, and change records, including overtime and leave statuses. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU 04 (Special Housing Unit) on the roster.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Appears in change records as being inserted into a shift for 7 NORTH, with a status of Sick/Annual leave.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 24, 2019.
The document details shift assignments, posts (like SHU, Control, Escort), and staff leave statuses (Sick, Annual, LWOP, AWOL).
It shows a high level of staff movement and overtime, with 23 overtime occurrences logged.
The roster includes a 'Special Assignments' section and details for posts like 'EPO OFFICE ESCORT', which may be relevant to high-profile inmate movements.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it relates to the period of his incarceration at MCC New York.
